name: Holy Reckoning
description: Triggered virtue effects now grant might to allies in addition to their bonuses. Gain fury when activating Rushing Justice.

name: Psychic Riposte
description: Blocking or evading an attack stocks <c=@abilitytype>blades</c>. Dodging stocks a blade and causes your next Bladesong to be unblockable.

facts.text: Blades Stocked on Block or Evade

name: Bladeturn Refrain
description: <c=@abilitytype>Bladesongs</c> grant aegis.

facts.description: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.

name: Pistol Proficiency
description: You can wield pistols.

name: Dagger Proficiency
description: You can wield daggers.

name: Duelist's Reversal
description: Blocking or dodging an attack grants boons.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.
Critical chance increased; stacks duration.
Gain health every second; stacks duration.

name: Psychic Blades
description:
Whenever a clone would be summoned, you instead stock a blade. Blades persist indefinitely until used. Your shatters are replaced with Bladesongs that consume your stocked blades, but still count as shatters for the purposes of core traits.

While out of combat, you will automatically stock a blade every 10 seconds.

skills.name: Bladesong Harmony
skills.description: Bladesong. Fire all stocked blades at your target.

traited_facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

skills.name: Bladesong Sorrow

facts.description: Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.

skills.description: Bladesong. Fire all stocked blades, inflicting your target with conditions.

Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

skills.name: Bladesong Dissonance
skills.description: Bladesong. Combine all your blades into one large blade that dazes targets based on the number of blades consumed.

traited_facts.description: Critical chance increased; stacks duration.

skills.name: Bladesong Distortion

facts.description: Immune to conditions and damage.
Immune to conditions and damage.

skills.description: Bladesong. Gain distortion and consume all stocked blades, gaining additional distortion for each consumed blade.

skills.name: Bladeturn Requiem
skills.description: Bladesong.Send your blades spinning around you to hit nearby foes. Spinning blade duration scales with number of blades consumed.

traited_facts.description: Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

name: Corrupted Talent
description: Gain life force when you enter Harbinger Shroud.

description: Your power is increased. While in Harbinger Shroud, you gain an aura that pulses each interval to damage and cripple nearby enemies.

skills.description: Damage and cripple nearby enemies.

name: Bolstering Brew

name: Twisted Medicine
description: Elixir skills also grant their boons to allies within the elixir impact radius. Gain concentration based on your vitality.

name: Righteous Sprint
description: Gain increased movement speed. Gain swiftness when you activate a virtue.

facts.description: Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.

name: Bloodsong
description: Bleeding you apply deals increased damage. Stock a <c=@abilitytype>blade</c> after applying enough stacks of bleeding to foes.

name: Energized Elements
description: Gain energy and boons when you switch attunements. <c=@reminder>Energy can only be gained while in combat. </c>

description:
Swapping weapons strikes all nearby foes.

skills.description: After a delay, deliver a circular attack to foes around you. Increases flow rate if it hits.

name: Gun X Sword
description: Gain access to the <c=@abilitytype>Gunsaber</c> as an alternate weapon set, but lose the ability to swap to other weapon sets during combat. Adrenaline is replaced with <c=@abilitytype>flow</c>.

skills.name: Flow
skills.description: Flow is gained at a constant rate while in combat and decays quickly when combat ends. Attacking will not generate flow, and flow cannot be used for core warrior burst skills. Skills and traits that generate adrenaline will have their adrenaline gain converted to flow.

name: Depth of Elements
description:
Build up elemental energy when you strike foes. Energy is consumed to imbue the jade sphere with different elements, creating combo fields and granting boons to allies in the area.
Gain access to Augments.

Legendary Alliance abilities gain an additional bonus. Activating Energy Meld or Alliance Tactics grants both of these bonuses simultaneously at greater amounts to nearby allies.
Kurzick abilities grant regeneration.
Luxon abilities grant might.

name: Mech Fighter

name: Exigency Protocols
description: When your mech is struck while under half health, it activates Exigency Protocols, gaining damage reduction and regeneration for a short duration. Regeneration boons you apply are stronger.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

name: Unleashed Power
description: Gain access to <c=@abilitytype>Cantrips</c> and <c=@abilitytype>Unleash</c>. While your pet is unleashed, its skills are replaced with larger area-of-effect skills. Once per interval, <c=@abilitytype>Unleashed Ambush</c> skills become available for a short period of time after you unleash.

name: Consume Shadows
description: Gain stacks of Consume Shadows at regular intervals while in Shadow Shroud. Exiting Shadow Shroud consumes your remaining shadow force and heals allies based on the number of stacks you have gained. Allies that are fully healed receive the rest of the value in barrier.

name: Mech Frame: Channeling Conduits
description: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Crisis Zone. When you or your mech apply barrier, also grant a boon to the affected target. Your mech gains a greater percentage of your own concentration and healing power stats.

Mech Command. Your mech removes conditions, breaks stuns, and grants boons to itself and nearby allies.

The mech does not count against the target count for this skill.

name: Nature's Shield
description: <c=@abilitytype>Cantrips</c> grant barrier to you and your pet.

name: Corrupting Vines
description: Rending Vines converts boons into conditions instead of removing them. <c=@abilitytype>Unleashed Ambush</c> skills remove boons from enemies. <c=@reminder>Cannot affect enemies more than once per skill.</c>

name: Mech Arms: Jade Cannons
description: Melee attacks become ranged, have an increased chance to critically hit, and apply vulnerability. Unlocks the Mech Command skill Spark Revolver.

name: Panaku's Ambition
description:
Gain barrier when you strike foes with a stealth attack. When you apply stealth to allies, you also grant them barrier.
This effect can only be received once and will reset when stealth is removed.

name: Mech Core: Barrier Engine
description:
Unlocks the Mech Command skill Barrier Burst. While in combat, your mech will automatically grant a small barrier each interval to nearby allies.

The mech does not count against the target count for this trait.

facts.description: Heal for a percentage of your outgoing damage.
Your outgoing strike damage is increased, and your incoming strike damage is reduced.

name: Second Opinion
description: A portion of condition damage is converted to healing power. Gain condition damage, which is increased when wielding a scepter.

name: Traversing Dusk
description: Heal allies in the area around you when you shadowstep. Gain shadow force for each ally in the radius. Wells grant resistance on their initial impact.

facts.description: Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.
Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

name: Natural Fortitude
description: Gain vitality. <c=@abilitytype>Unleashed Ambush</c> skills siphon health if they hit. Siphon healing is reduced for each target struck beyond the first. <c=@reminder> Cannot siphon the same target more than once per skill.</c>

name: Cleansing Unleash
description: Remove conditions when you or your pet unleash.

name: Amplified Siphoning
description: Gain increased shadow force when hitting a foe with <c=@abilitytype>Siphon</c>. Grant increased barrier when targeting an ally.

name: Shadestep
description: Shadow Shroud skills provide additional supportive effects to nearby allies and your tethered ally.

prefix.description: Unleash darkness at a target, inflicting conditions on foes while healing and granting might to nearby allies and your tethered ally for each target struck.

facts.description: Skills recharge faster.

prefix.description: Unleash darkness in a targeted area, inflicting conditions on foes and cleansing allies. Cleanse conditions from yourself while healing and cleansing your tethered ally, based on targets struck.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

prefix.description: Unleash darkness in a targeted area, inflicting conditions on foes and cleansing allies. Cleanse conditions from yourself while healing and cleansing your tethered ally, based on targets struck.

facts.description: Incoming strike damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.

prefix.description: Leap to the targeted area, inflicting fear on foes at your ending point. Grant barrier to your tethered ally and nearby allies based on targets struck. Heal your tethered ally based on targets struck.
Strike at foes in front of you with your shadow magic, inflicting conditions. Nearby allies and your tethered ally gain health for each enemy struck.

facts.description: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.

prefix.description: After a short channel, unleash a blast of compressed magic that stuns enemies. Nearby allies and your tethered ally gain stability. Heal your tethered ally based on each enemy you hit.

name: Larcenous Torment
description:
Steal health and gain shadow force when you torment a foe.
Does not grant shadow force while in shroud.

name: Mechanical Genius
description:
Through your mechanical genius, you have utilized Canthan jade technology to build a customized battle mech that will fight at your side.
Your mech inherits a percentage of all of your combat attributes except precision, which is added to its own.
Your tool belt skills are replaced with Mech Commands, customized by your trait choices. Mech Commands take longer to recharge when using them far away from your mech.
Gain access to signet utility skills.

name: Mech Core: Jade Dynamo
description: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Jade Mortar. Mech Command skills grant you quickness when used and have a reduced cooldown.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.

skills.name: Jade Mortar

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

skills.description: Mech Command. Launch a powerful mortar attack at the target.

name: Mech Frame: Variable Mass Distributor

skills.name: Core Reactor Shot
skills.description: Mech Command. Charge up and then release a powerful ball of jade energy at your target that explodes on contact.

name: Scepter Proficiency
description: You can wield scepters.

name: Mech Arms: High-Impact Drivers
description:
Unlocks the Mech Command skill Explosive Knuckle. Your mech's attacks now generate might for allies within a radius. This effect may only occur once per interval.

The mech does not count against the target count for this trait.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

name: Debilitating Blows

Disabling a foe applies conditions to that foe based on your current state.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description:
Gain access to the Mech Command skill Sky Circus. While dismissed or away for repairs, your mech supports you with an occasional aerial bombardment.
Signet skills gain improved passive effects and continue to grant their passive bonuses while recharging.

skills.name: Sky Circus

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

skills.description: Mech Command. Your mech jets into the air and fires a missile at each nearby foe before crashing down and dealing additional damage to anything caught underfoot.

name: Shallow Grave
description: Transfer conditions to an enemy when targeting them with Siphon. Remove conditions from nearby allies and your targeted ally when targeting them with Siphon.

name: Hungering Darkness
description: While in shroud, transfer conditions from your tethered ally and cleanse conditions from yourself. Each condition removed in this fashion heals a percentage of your base health and grants your tethered ally barrier.

name: Blinding Outburst
description: Venomous Outburst deals more damage and applies blindness in addition to its other effects. <c=@abilitytype>Unleashed Ambush</c> skills deal more damage.

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

name: Fierce as Fire
description: Gain increased strike damage for each round of ammunition spent.

facts.description: Damage increase per stack.

name: Lush Forest
description:
Using the first round of ammo on an ammunition skill reduces the recharge of all warrior skills.
Does not affect the recharge of Unsheathe Gunsaber, Sheathe Gunsaber, and Dragon Trigger.

name: Eternal Champion
description: Gain stability and endurance when entering berserk mode. Traits that trigger when entering berserk mode also trigger when exiting berserk mode. You can now exit berserk mode early.

facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
